content: *a free pattern from the book vanna s choice heartfelt gifts to knit & crochet lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # logcabin pattern available on lion brand website if you type baby log cabin blanket in search box skill level beginner + level 2 vanna s choice® article #860 5 colors 9 balls total 2 colors 1 ball each a b 2 colors 2 balls each c d 1 color 3 balls e *pink silver blue pea green dusty rose dusty purple* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 1 block = 9 23 cm square work 16 square blocks complete 4 borders for each square arrange squares to form a large square of 4 blocks by 4 blocks sew squares together crochet edging to finish
